inclusion.criterion: Receiving antibiotics for not more than 48 hours prior to enrollment and free from
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: able to understand and sign informed consent and HIPPA
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: subjects should have the mental ability to understand and willingness to fulfill all the details of the protocol
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: three or more soft and unformed or watery stools per day at admission
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: neutropenia (an absolute neutrophil count (ANC) of less than 1500/microL)
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: HIV positive with a CD4+ T-lymphocyte count <400 per mcL blood
exclusion.label: does_not_trigger

exclusion.criterion: requiring care in an intensive care unit
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has V. cholerae in stool, but no fever and blood pressure is low.
